text: The Voyah Passion is a full-size Luxury sedan made by Voyah a brand of Dongfeng since 2022. == History and Features == In December 2022 Voyah has shown its third model and first passenger car this car is the Passion. the car has a gently slopping roofline that remember fastback cars and it has features such as:31 sensors, 12 cameras, 5 radars and 12 ultrasonic sensors all this ensure a semi-autonomous driving the Passion was then launched in China 2023. The Voyah Passion has a electric motor with 375 kW (503 hp) with a 1-speed direct-drive transmission people can choose between a small 86 kWh battery pack with a range of 580 km (360 mi) and a larger 109 kWh battery pack with a range of 730 km (454 mi). == Markets == The Voyah Passion was first launched in The Chinese Market and is also sold in European countries like Norway Italy Finland and the Netherlands. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Voyah Passion
